tag_list: lucas-brown, hasoffers, affiliate-marketing, affiliate-tracking, performance-advertising, online-advertising, twins, hasoffers-twin
overview: As CEO of HasOffers, Lucas ensures the highest level of product development, brand, sales, marketing, and customer support. Lucas oversees all high level company strategy, concentrating on the profitability and growth of HasOffers. With a background as both an affiliate and affiliate network owner, his established success provides HasOffers with invaluable experience and industry knowledge. Lucas graduated magna cum laude, from Babson College, with a focus in Legal Studies and Marketing.
